message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll love it.
Hi Alice, $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $85.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $92 to make it worth my while.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $92 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $88, but that's my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $88. I'll meet you in the middle of $88 and $90, so I'll offer it to you for $89.
